post.body: 140 or less!
There are other NAS devices that perform faster, so I skipped out on that one. I think Felicia Day tweeted one?
Weird, I was just making space in the room last night for our party. Twister would fit lovely!
Happy 4th (5th?) Day of Hanukkah.
The show, which I'm going to finish before I head home tonight.
I am. Officially only to reserve SpectralSpark. Oh, download the Drunk Dial app, if you haven't.
Danny's well; I'm about to pass him off to Jeremy in a bit. We've been watching Ghost in the Shell today!
AHHHH! IN JERSEY!? NOOOO!!!
For blog: Dinner with Director's Commentary, Manners Invented for Reasons.
I should've asked that bartender if she'd be working New Year's Eve.
Vanessa got me a pillow identical to the one I left home that she stole in September.
Good God, I've stumbled upon an assualt on Universal Reason itself.
This room can't be less than 70 degrees. Also, my mom got a Blackberry Storm from work today.
I'm in PATH car number 666. Fate has a sense of humor... And knows Jersey is hell.
I love how I need nothing more than this to live, besides food, of course. http://twitpic.com/w4kq
Whoa, that was so philosophically enlightening. Stand Alone Complex is the shit.
Four more episodes of Stand Alone Complex, and then I'm heading out.
I'm bitching to @julium about how I don't want to go to Jersey. I'd rather continue hiding in her dorm room, but she's off to work soon. =(
I am dreading going home; someone should let me stay with them!!!
My boss said I could go home at like four, but Cassie needs to recharge. >_<
